definition: hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: The lifting of the curtain disclosed a beautiful painting.
sentences.chinese: 簾幕啓開後，露出一幅漂亮的圖畫。

sentences.english: The acoustic curtain belongs to the porous organic-fiber acoustic material.
sentences.chinese: 吸聲簾幕屬於多孔有機纖維吸聲材料。

sentences.english: Will you help me take the curtains down?
sentences.chinese: 你能幫我把簾幕取下來嗎？

sentences.english: The new curtains tone in beautifully with the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 新簾幕與地毯的顏色非常協調。

sentences.english: When suddenly from before my eyes the hills vanished like curtains drawn aside.
sentences.chinese: 忽然間那座山峯，像簾幕拉開一樣從我眼前消失了。

sentences.english: I walked on without trembling, and drawing the heavy curtain aside I entered in.
sentences.chinese: 我毫無懼色地走上前去，拉開沉重的簾幕邁了進去。

definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
